LanguageData.NHE.label: Nuclear Strike
LanguageData.NHE.description: This type features greater destructive effects and radiation contamination. The increased damage comes at the cost of a shorter range, which is not good for lightly armed shooters.
LanguageData.THE.label: Nuclear Strike, Ordered Time
LanguageData.THE.description: The timer is 5 seconds. It does not explode on collision with other objects, so it bounces off walls or corners. Projectiles that directly hit enemies will deal damage in addition to causing a subsequent explosion.
